name: Impulse
description:
IMPULSE is a no-frills, high-speed, purely-competitive game of carball.

No glitch exploitation.
No nonsense.
Pure carball.

Hate competitive matches? Don’t play this game.

All cars are equal:
equal top speed available (no boost level)
equal maneuverability
identical hitbox
no excuses

Have no friends? That’s OK we built Vicky, an AI-powered bot that has nothing better to do than to play IMPULSE with you.

Welcome to the beginning.
Welcome to IMPULSE.

* controller only game because using a keyboard and mouse to play a game like this is weird.
